name: Beyond Two Boundaries
description:
Alt Google Drive Link

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HNxInaXdjTAjtY_NQM42z5-mz5px2m0r/view?usp=shari...

Beyond Two Boundaries is a 2D puzzle platformer where you come awake in a strange land and discover that your soul has separated from your physical body.

STORY SUMMARY

Your soul, while retaining a clear similarity to the host; also clearly depicts its own autonomous thought and personality. You're told that in order to reconcile both forms into the original,  you must go on a journey across  a surreal, puzzle-like realm. By using your newfound “Dimension Shift” abilities, you'll collect “Soul Orbs” to progress through each area while also confronting your newfound companion.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

A = Move Left
D = Move Right 
SPACE = Jump
E = Interact
SHIFT = Dimension Shift
RIGHT CLICK (HOLD) - Zoom out perspective
R - Reset Level
H (HOLD) - Help Menu
F - Switch between physical body and soul state (Only in Soul Breach)
ESC - Pause Menu / Skip

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A GPS1 student project by UOWM KDU students
